Translations.Text: When they vide it happening faces de those disbelieved turn miserable proclaimed Hoc est quod vos used mock
Dictus DEUS decides annihilate me those withme shower nos cum His mercy est ibi protect disbelievers painful retribution
dictus He est the Multus Gracious; nos believe in Eum nos trust Eum. Vos perfecit surely invenit out qui est really far astray
Dictus Quod si tuus aqua sinks away qui provisus vos perfecit pure aqua
Domicella pen quod they people scripsit
Vos attained major beatus ex tuus Dominus; vos non est crazy
Tuus Dominus est fully aware de those qui strayed His path He est fully aware de those guided
They wish vos compromise they too compromise
Et though he possessed satis moneta infans
When noster revelations recited eum he dictus Tales ex preter
